verses.verse: Now when the queen<WH4436> of Sheba<WH7614> heard<WH8085> about the fame<WH8088> of Solomon<WH8010> concerning the name<WH8034> of the Lord,<WH3068> she came<WH935> to test<WH5254> him with difficult<WH2420> questions.<WH2420>

"Nevertheless I did not believe<WH539> the reports,<WH1697> until<WH5704> <WH834> I came<WH935> and my eyes<WH5869> had seen<WH7200> it. And behold,<WH2009> the half<WH2677> was not told<WH5046> me. "How blessed<WH835> are your men,<WH376> how blessed<WH835> are these<WH428> your servants<WH5650> who stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> you continually<WH8548> [and] hear<WH8085> your wisdom.<WH2451>

"Blessed<WH1288> be the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> who<WH834> delighted<WH2654> in you to set<WH5414> you on the throne<WH3678> of Israel;<WH3478> because the Lord<WH3068> loved<WH157> Israel<WH3478> forever,<WH5769> therefore He made<WH7760> you king,<WH4428> to do<WH6213> justice<WH4941> and righteousness.<WH6666>"

And she gave<WH5414> the king<WH4428> a hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242> talents<WH3603> of gold,<WH2091> and a very<WH3966> great<WH7235> [amount] of spices<WH1314> and precious<WH3368> stones.<WH68> Never<WH3808> again<WH5750> did such<WH1931> abundance<WH7230> of spices<WH1314> come<WH935> in as that which<WH834> the queen<WH4436> of Sheba<WH7614> gave<WH5414> King<WH4428> Solomon.<WH8010>

And King<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> gave<WH5414> to the queen<WH4436> of Sheba<WH7614> all<WH3605> her desire<WH2656> which<WH834> she requested,<WH7592> besides<WH4480> <WH905> what<WH834> he gave<WH5414> her according to his royal<WH4428> bounty.<WH3027> Then she turned<WH6437> and went<WH1980> to her own land<WH776> together with her servants.<WH5650>

And twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> lions<WH738> were standing<WH5975> there<WH8033> on the six<WH8337> steps<WH4609> on the one<WH2088> side<WH2088> and on the other;<WH2088> nothing<WH3808> like<WH3651> [it] was made<WH6213> for any<WH3605> other kingdom.<WH4467>

And all<WH3605> King<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010>'s drinking<WH4945> vessels<WH3627> [were] of gold,<WH2091> and all<WH3605> the vessels<WH3627> of the house<WH1004> of the forest<WH9194> of Lebanon<WH3844> [were] of pure<WH5462> gold.<WH2091> None<WH369> was of silver;<WH3701> it was not considered<WH2803> valuable<WH3972> in the days<WH3117> of Solomon.

For the king<WH4428> had at sea<WH3220> the ships<WH590> of Tarshish<WH8659> with the ships<WH590> of Hiram;<WH2438> once<WH259> every three<WH7969> years<WH8141> the ships<WH590> of Tarshish<WH8659> came<WH935> bringing<WH5375> gold<WH2091> and silver,<WH3701> ivory<WH8143> and apes<WH6971> and peacocks.<WH8500>
So King<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> became<WH1431> greater<WH1431> than<WH4480> all<WH3605> the kings<WH4428> of the earth<WH776> in riches<WH6239> and in wisdom.<WH2451>
And all<WH3605> the earth<WH776> was seeking<WH1245> the presence<WH6440> of Solomon,<WH8010> to hear<WH8085> his wisdom<WH2451> which<WH834> God<WH430> had put<WH5414> in his heart.<WH3820>

And they brought<WH935> every<WH376> man<WH376> his gift,<WH4503> articles<WH3627> of silver<WH3701> and gold,<WH2091> garments,<WH8008> weapons,<WH5402> spices,<WH1314> horses,<WH5483> and mules,<WH6505> so<WH1697> much<WH1697> year<WH8141> by year.<WH8141>

Now Solomon<WH8010> gathered<WH622> chariots<WH7393> and horsemen;<WH6571> and he had<WH1961> 1400 chariots<WH7393> and 12000 horsemen,<WH6571> and he stationed<WH5148> them in the chariot<WH7393> cities<WH5892> and with the king<WH4428> in Jerusalem.<WH3389>
